job_tasks.phrase: Designing, building, testing the infrastructure of a central AI Platform on Azure using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building and testing infrastructure for an AI platform, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Designing, improving and maintaining CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of CI/CD pipelines and Azure DevOps directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and managing AI/software in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring the reliability of the existing environments.
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring reliability of environments is a key aspect of operations and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring a seamless operation and deployment of Azure AI services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the operational focus on seamless deployment and management of AI services.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrating various tools and technologies in the DevOps toolchain to accelerate Data Science teams' use cases from development to real world applications.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating tools and technologies into a toolchain to enable the development and deployment of applications is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Identifying industry best practices and assessing the feasibility and benefits of implementing such practices.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves understanding industry trends and evaluating their business impact, which aligns with business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with various team members and teams to test and develop infrastructure to realize business requirements for AI services.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating to develop infrastructure for business requirements is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring the usage, availability, health of the systems and products.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring system health and availability is a critical component of operations and MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: using the latest AI and GenAI capabilities
Collaborating with various team members and teams

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes designing, building, and testing infrastructure for an AI platform, integrating tools, and managing CI/CD pipelines. While GenAI capabilities are mentioned, the core focus on infrastructure, reliability, deployment, and integration aligns more with the operational and engineering aspects of an ML Engineer.
